data.text: @EU_Commission Shame from Catalonia.
@EU_Commission #StopBorrell
@EU_Commission Are human the Catalans?

In 1939
Hitler +Nazi Party +Fascism Vs Jews 

Now in 2019
Modi +BJP +Hindu Extremism Vs Kashmir 

In 1939 whole world defeated Hitler's Agenda 

Let see now

@EU_Commission Now only russia left to free
@EU_Commission You should inforce equal rights for LGBT+ in all member countries. Look at Poland.

@EU_Commission Tots els éssers humans??? Colla d'hipòcrites de merda, als catalans ens estant reprimint amb presó exili multes econòmiques, no deixant que els nostres polítics elegits per 2 milions de persones estiguin al parlament de la UE etc. Normal lo del brexit, i no serà l'únic en marxar
@EU_Commission We voted for Mr. Puigdemont, where are my rights?
@EU_Commission There are still 3 EMP Catalan elected without right to sit in EP. #ShameEurope #aferlamà

@EU_Commission except the Catalans, who are second-hand citizens
@EU_Commission Ready to support #justice in #catalonia and prosecute the police beatings of peaceful voters?
@EU_Commission We, Catalans, are not represented by our MEP in the European Parliament... till when will we condemned not to be represented and why?

@EU_Commission Shame European Commission

@EU_Commission SUCK MY CATALAN DICK MOTHERFUCKERS

@EU_Commission @NadiaCalvino @TimmermansEU @VeraJourova @EU_Justice @ChristianWigand I seguim publicant notícies que intenten blanqujar la façana d’Europa mentre obliden víctimes del mar, d’atacs terroristes, de règims que mantenen presoners i presoneres polítiques... quan es farà realment justicia i neteja de politics que adapten les lleis a les seves cadires?

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @VeraJourova @EU_Justice @ChristianWigand A free Europe where there's journalists getting killed, political prisoners, democratic votes being overturned, protesters getting beaten. This free Europe ? 🤔

@EU_Commission The #BalticWay30  is the Catalan Way. Bye bye Spain!

Long live Independent Catalonia and we don't want it in the European Union.

Congratulations to the brave people from Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania.

@EU_Commission @solange_lebourg If only ple cd become aware of this esp now as Narcissism plays chess on world stage. "There r other ways of finding satisfaction, recipes for human happiness, enjoyment, dignified&meaningful, gratifying life, than increased consumption that increases production." Zygmunt Bauman

@EU_Commission @EiropasKomisija @EuroopaKomisjon @TimmermansEU @VeraJourova I am Catalan and I feel deep sorrow and shame about how the commission has treated the Catalan people.  Shame that in Europe there are political prisoners

@EU_Commission Catalonia also demonstrated its Catalan Way in 2013 trying to recover the National Freedom missed after several wars against Castilla/Spain...Still occupied with a harsh repression. What are you going to do to respect the democratic right of Catalans? #Catalonia

@EU_Commission @EiropasKomisija @EuroopaKomisjon @TimmermansEU @VeraJourova Catalonia also demonstrated its Catalan Way in 2013 trying to recover the National Freedom missed after several wars against Castilla/Spain...Still occupied with a harsh repression. What are you going to do to respect the democratic right of Catalans? #Catalonia

They form the Hongkong Way to show the world they are fighting for democracy and justice against corrupted  governmental systems. More will be learned from Europe in the pursuit of Freedom. #TheHongKongWay

@EU_Commission Why are targeting so much the air travel and pay little attention to other public transports? Trains for instance or busses. All public and private companies, all requesting a fee for travelling, and all taxed

@EU_Commission Please also take a look at #HongKongWay ! #HongKongProtesters also look forward to a good ending for withdrawal of #ExtraditionBill 
#FightForFreedom. #StandWithHongKong

@EU_Commission Shame of being European.  With the Catalan way you shut up.  Why don't you talk about this too? ... Europe does not allow it to be spoken in Catalan, as the official language, when it is the mother tongue of 10 million Europeans.

@EU_Commission @EU_Social Oh all the EU haters here, the alternative would be: WE would ALL be SPEAKING GERMAN NOW!!!

yes, history and facts are hard to swallow.

Choose the less corrupt and most transparent! 

Trust based will be replaced with transparency, baby boomers only know the former, what a mess
@EU_Commission Brilliant all for one one for all! United EU stands, divided it falls!

@EU_Commission @EU_Social Annoying catalans, I get you want to escape spanish corruption, but you're just as corrupt as the spaniards. STATISTICS!

STOP IT WITH THE NATIONALISM! PP LOVES THAT. 

All countries have richer regions supporting the other regions and Cat is not Swiss. 

BTW Aragon flag!! lol

@EU_Commission In most areas the HRA of the UK can be overridden if the govt feels it wants to. Many of the so called "rights" it "enshrines" are conditional, not absolute. They can take them away when they feel like it.

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @VeraJourova @EU_Justice @ChristianWigand Thanks

Danke

@EU_Commission Oui le droit de homme doit être respecté.
Ceux qui ne respect pas le droit de homme doit être puni sévèrement
@EU_Commission @acgrayling The Tories don't want us to have any Social rights at all. Doing their utmost to dismantle everything. Worse still after Brexit I imagine.

@EU_Commission Are people who don't agree on the definition of human rights entitled to them? Or are they entitled to their own definition?
iSlam claims it overrules the commonly accepted definition.

@EU_Commission Are you sure all your Muslim citizens, especially the religious leaders (let's assume #islam to be a religion like the rest for the sake of argument), understand human rights the same as you? Do you dare answer in a meaningful and thorough manner?
@EU_Commission It’s not the true yuo are a Lobby

@EU_Commission Stop fooling people across the globe. The forcefully annexation of Kashmir without the will of their inhabitants. Genocide, extra judicial killings, kidnapping of innocent children's, women's and aged people are going on in Kashmir and you still haven't spoken a word. Shame

@EU_Commission For God’s sake have some shame and decency. The EC is a dust particle that is ineffective and really pathetic. Why haven’t you voiced concern for women who are being raped in #OccupiedKashmir by fascist Indian soldiers? Utterly shameful behaviour on your part. #SaveKashmir

@EU_Commission Airlines will never care about passengers' rights. Carriers know you will be unable to enforce them as long as they remain strong enough to blackmail EU institutions. If U want citizens' rights, corporate power wiil have to be curbed.

@EU_Commission @AlbertRoyo5 What about Catalans who would like to administer their own inland revenue affairs but remain part of the EU and not being subjugated by the FASCIST SPANISH NATIONALIST regime? Do they have the right to self-determination or holding political prisoners in the EU is ok? #ShameOnEU
@EU_Commission Unit & unify,  words used in this tweet to describe an independence process. Like you have done in Spain with Catalonia...

@EU_Commission I had already wondered if Remainers could form a human chain across the country. Didn't realise it had been done before. There are so many '.........for Europe' outfits in the UK, surely we could organise this. How about it @peoplesvote_uk? You have the organisation to do it.

@EU_Commission please do something to prevent Brazil PM from using amazon rainforest for political gains. As a human, I expect you to at least react, not maintaining silence when whole of Europe does business with Brazil.

@EU_Commission @CopernicusEU #ActForTheAmazon 

The American Empire has meddled in Brazilian elections, installing the Bolsonaro's colonial governement. The interest of Corporate America is to keep Brazil as an exporter of commodities. Hence the destrucion of Amazonas.
@EU_Commission For a United EU!🇪🇺🏳️ for peace!
